channel.title: Adrian's Dev Blog
channel.description: My personal programming blog, with a hint of petroleum..

item.title: New Blog
item.description: So I’ve finally moved over to Gatsby for my blog platform with the gatsby-starter-blog. I decided not to migrate across the old pages, given…
item.content:encoded: So I’ve finally moved over to Gatsby for my blog platform with the gatsby-starter-blog. I decided not to migrate across the old pages, given the page views were relatively low and very outdated! But if you really want to find them, look here.
